verses.text: And there was a man of mount Ephraim, whose name \add was\add* Micah.

And he said unto his mother, The eleven hundred \add shekels\add* of silver that were taken from thee, about which thou cursedst, and spakest of also in mine ears, behold, the silver \add is\add* with me; I took it. And his mother said, Blessed \add be thou\add* of the \sc Lord\sc*, my son.

And when he had restored the eleven hundred \add shekels\add* of silver to his mother, his mother said, I had wholly dedicated the silver unto the \sc Lord\sc* from my hand for my son, to make a graven image and a molten image: now therefore I will restore it unto thee.

Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred \add shekels\add* of silver, and gave them to the founder, who made thereof a graven image and a molten image: and they were in the house of Micah.
And the man Micah had a house of gods, and made an ephod, and teraphim, and consecrated one of his sons, who became his priest.
In those days \add there was\add* no king in Israel, \add but\add* every man did \add that\add* which \add was\add* right in his own eyes.
And there was a young man out of Beth-lehem-judah of the family of Judah, who \add was\add* a Levite, and he sojourned there.
And the man departed out of the city from Beth-lehem-judah to sojourn where he could find \add a place:\add* and he came \add to\add* mount Ephraim to the house of Micah, as he journeyed.
And Micah said unto him, Whence comest thou? And he said unto him, I \add am\add* a Levite of Beth-lehem-judah, and I go to sojourn where I may find \add a place\add*.

And Micah said unto him, Dwell with me, and be unto me a father and a priest, and I will give thee ten \add shekels\add* of silver by the year, and a suit of apparel, and thy victuals. So the Levite went \add in\add*.
And the Levite was content to dwell with the man; and the young man was unto him as one of his sons.
And Micah consecrated the Levite; and the young man became his priest, and was in the house of Micah.
Then said Micah, Now know I that the \sc Lord\sc* will do me good, seeing I have a Levite to \add my\add* priest.
